title: Senya Ichiya Monogatari
synopsis: Aladdin, a lowly water seller, is new to the city of Baghdad when he sees the beautiful Miriam being sold at a slave auction. Enthralled by her beauty, Aladdin manages to steal Miriam from the auction and spends a passionate night with her in an unoccupied home. When the two wake, however, they are met by the owner of the home and are tragically separated.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Eiichi', ['Director']], ['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Script']], ['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Storyboard', ' Series Composition', ' Art Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Sugino, Akio', ['Key Animation']]]
